name: Hestia.International
description:
Hestia is an AI and Machine Learning augmented, state-of-the-art real estate marketplace where property buyers and sellers use an open electronic auction model (like capital markets) for fair price discovery to buy and sell properties.

Hestia provides buyers and sellers, access to a property professionals’ marketplace (conveyancers, architects, valuers, surveyors, et al) to help them complete the entire property transaction through a single interactive, intelligent, customizable workflow tool. 

The Hestia platform applies intelligent technologies to provide relevant advanced data analytics, at every stage of the process, to educate the buyers and sellers for better decision making.

Most importantly, Hestia is a commission free ‘world’, with no intermediaries thus providing a cheaper, safer and faster property transaction model. 

Hestia will be implementing Blockchain technology to settle property transactions in future implementations.

team.title: SME
team.name: Claudia Giannoni
team.bioHtml: Founded BreshiStudio, ASI Progetti Director @ Echo London. M.Arch @University Of Florence, Italy MSc, PhD student @University College London.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Budha Bhattacharya
team.bioHtml: Founder @Hestia.International, @Aryaman Consultancy • Worked at @Goldman Sachs, @UBS

jobs.title: Machine Learning Intern
jobs.description:
We are looking for a machine learning intern to help us build the first artificially intelligent real estate marketplace (solving a complex coordination problem).

What You Will Do: 

-Replicating variations of prominent research papers in machine learning to test our own hypothesis. 

-Develop assigned parts of the project to help the team put together and test machine learning (Neural Net solutions, Evolutionary Algorithms) models from the ground up. 

-Complete assigned research work and help the team make qualified decisions. 

-Help modify and improve our existing model with research, domain experience and experimentation.  

-Document and publish a generalized version of your work every month on the company blog.

-In addition to the above, we might need customisation and personalisation of clone scripts (and white label products) for POC purposes.

jobs.title: Visual Design Intern/ Front End Developer
jobs.description:
The Visual Design Intern will be responsible for the end-to-end process of transforming Hestia's product requirements into visually stunning and highly functional user interfaces. As a member of the Product Development team, the Visual Designer will collaborate to continuously improve the quality and innovation of the user interface for products and enterprise systems.

Responsibilities:

-Create superior user experiences through the design of elegant interfaces.
-Collaborate with Product Team to create sketches, wireframes, Photoshop mockups, or interactive prototypes to support early product concepts and ideas. 
-Design clean, usable workflows for eCommerce processes.
-Design Web application user interfaces that are on-brand, visually attractive, and cohesive.
-Create production-quality visual assets and icons for the development teams. 
-Present, defend, and revise your design ideas through design reviews and subsequent iterations.
-Create HTML and CSS-based prototypes for design ideas and collaborate with front-end and back-end developers to produce working interfaces.


Position Requirements

-A passion for UI and Web design trends. 
-Strong understanding of Web usability, interaction design, and information architecture. 
-Experience working in UI/UX and design for the Web. 
-Extensive experience in Adobe Photoshop producing pixel-perfect screen designs.
-Expert in creating UI wireframes using tools such as Visio, Balsamiq, OmniGraffle, or Illustrator. 
-Technical mastery of HTML and CSS. 
-Strong grasp of underlying Web application technologies and their limitations: JavaScript, Flash, XML 
-Commitment to personal growth and continuous learning.

Compensation: 

- This is an unpaid Internship. The successful candidate may be offered a full time employment opportunity at the end of the Internship. 

- Students/ New Professionals interested in experiencing a top Silicon Valley or European incubators are encouraged to apply
